title: Our WILDEST E3 2021 Predictions!
description:
SPLINTER CELL?! EA BIG?! SUPERMAN?! All of these will probably not happen but it's fun to get hyped. 

Thank you for our special guests: 
Jeff Grubb - https://twitter.com/JeffGrubb
Janet Garcia https://twitter.com/Gameonysus
Kahlief Adams - https://twitter.com/Kahjahkins

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

transcript_chunks.text: what's my e3 2021 out of left field impossible wildest dream scenario gatorade get hyped moment it's simple ladies and gentlemen it's the same e3 get hyped moment i've had since the history of e3 started it's the same get hyped moment i've had for 38 years of my life make a superman game where i play as superman and am a hero and get to go around and do superman things i don't want to fight him i don't want him to be mind controlled and i have to be a killer croc and try to make a normal superman game if there is one prediction that that would make for all of you at home would be i think ea big is going to come back i think ea's going to make an announcement i think ea big is gonna be a thing uh we're gonna see it we're gonna see a new nba street potentially maybe some other franchise is gonna dig into it again football maybe soccer i think there's a lack of that kind of game play in the space and i think now is the perfect time to see that thing come back into the world what's going

gonna dig into it again football maybe soccer i think there's a lack of that kind of game play in the space and i think now is the perfect time to see that thing come back into the world what's going on everybody it's your boy snow bike mike here with some wild hair and some wild e3 predictions finally grab your favorite rapper because it's going down def jam will return ea big please save us because we need you the most right now it's e3 i'm ready for it it's my favorite time of the year looking forward to whether we get news about you know will there be a follow-up to the to last year's madden nfl game will we get a new madden game this year think about that for a second what's up with google stadia when does that come out you know will we get a date about the release of google stadia who knows uh and i i can't wait to i can't wait to finally get some answers my wildest e3 2021 prediction is that when sony whenever they have their state of play right it's gonna be a couple weeks

who knows uh and i i can't wait to i can't wait to finally get some answers my wildest e3 2021 prediction is that when sony whenever they have their state of play right it's gonna be a couple weeks after we have ratchet and clank in our hands we're gonna play that game and there will in fact be a jackpot and dexter easter egg sony will confirm at their state of play that they are building the playstation mascot cinematic universe for video games and we're getting jack and daxter coming back sly cooper's coming back and they're building a shared universe with ratchet and clank and that they're eventually going to build to a series of games where they all come together like an avengers endgame moment and it's gonna be rad as hell this one i feel like barely constitutes as a prediction because we all know what's happening donkey kong 64 2 is announced at e3 and is coming out this fall for the nintendo switch and the nintendo switch pro we know that the mario odyssey team is working on a

we all know what's happening donkey kong 64 2 is announced at e3 and is coming out this fall for the nintendo switch and the nintendo switch pro we know that the mario odyssey team is working on a new donkey kong game and what other donkey kong game can it be than donkey kong 64 2 the game that we've all been requesting since 1999 donkey kong 64 was of course a masterpiece that we all loved we all loved it we all really appreciated donkey kong 64. it's gonna be great and we're all gonna be excited for it so that's my big e3 wild prediction donkey kong 64 too get hyped everybody hello kind of funny i'm jeff grubb i'm named after the jeff grub summer game mess it's a dread pirate roberts situation don't worry about it i was trained by the last jeff grub to run the summer game mess i will train my replacement and then that person will be named jeff grub what do i want from e3 it's a bunch of things number one i want jeff keeley to learn how to spell jeff wright i want the kids at kind of

my replacement and then that person will be named jeff grub what do i want from e3 it's a bunch of things number one i want jeff keeley to learn how to spell jeff wright i want the kids at kind of funny to get a hobby touch some grass with their feet leave me alone stop bothering an old man who's accomplished more than you ever will i want to play breath of the wild too and take a nap and i want huge pectoral muscles i think these things are all possible this e3 i expect nintendo to deliver on most of those things especially the pectoral muscles captain toe two captain toad two this game was so good we need another one make it happen nintendo hey everybody my e3 wish is less of a wish and more of a desperate plea to ubisoft please show us sam fisher's body i get it he's dead he's dead because you keep on bringing him up in these random games and little easter eggs he's in this mobile game where he looks like a disney infinity character he's in rainbow six siege where he looks like not

you keep on bringing him up in these random games and little easter eggs he's in this mobile game where he looks like a disney infinity character he's in rainbow six siege where he looks like not sam fisher bring this man's body home he has a daughter he has sarah fisher you're forgetting about sarah fisher she's walking around she's seeing her father in these games and she's like i'm that's not my father but then we can't prove it she can't prove it and she can't get the money that she deserves let us have a funeral for sam fisher put him to rest or make another splendor cell game i know that's not gonna happen but those are your two options as the e3 year of dreams somehow turned into the decade of dreams for me i've somehow gotten all the crazy games that i could ever wish for so i'm gonna continue wishing for things that probably aren't gonna happen in 1999 neversoft developed tony hawk's pro skater look at that it's autographed by the hawkman himself now here's the deal annually

as saying cky music is in quote the new tony hawk game coming out too what tony hawk game was cky music featured in the answer tony hawk's pro skater 3 is that my get hyped moment baby yes it is tony hawk's pro skater 3 remake baby add anything else you want to it i don't care that's all i need in life but if you're gonna be extra nice guess what this game right here boom super smash brothers if crash bandicoot's in it baby i'm gonna lose my mind for e3 i have one simple request nintendo please just delete mario party the whole game all of it all of them forever please don't make me play with nick anymore
